channel.title: history on Owen Churches's blog
channel.description: Recent content in history on Owen Churches's blog

item.title: Statistical history hour
item.description: A delightful side product of my Churchill fellowship in 2019 was the opportunity to visit a bunch of places in the United Kingdom that are important for various moments in statistical history. During the trip I tweeted some gratuitous selfies at some of these locations. So, this is a blog post to: Bring together the pictures and stories of those locations Extend the idea of visiting statistically significant locations as a tour using the TSP package to solve the problem of visiting these locations in the most efficient order.
